scan_table_check.description: Active users (which are not locked-out) must be a member in at least one active group. A user that is not a member of any group indicates incorrect data import from a directory or an insufficient security and access regime. This rule does not apply to technical users and test users.
scan_table_check.name: DataSanity - Users without group
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Deactivate, delete such users or make them member of an active group.
scan_table_check.short_description: Users must be member of a group
